On Aug 18, 2008, at 12:29 PM, Rickard =D6berg wrote:

> I had a look at the=
 suggested resources, and in general the approach
> seems to be to add anno=
tations to the Java properties, i.e. hardcoding
> it in sourcecode. Maybe t=
hat's fine. I tried adding this to Qi4j, but
> with a more generic "URI" an=
notation. Example code looks like this:
> @URI( "http://purl.org/dc/dcmityp=
e/PhysicalObject")
> public interface TestEntity
> extends EntityComposite
=
> {
> @URI( DcRdf.DC+"title")
> @NotEmpty Property<String> name();
>
> Asso=
ciation<TestEntity> association();
>
> ManyAssociation<TestEntity> manyAsso=
c();
>
> @URI("http://www.w3.org/2001/vcard-rdf/3.0#GROUP")
> ListAssociati=
on<TestEntity> listAssoc();
> }

You are aware of JSR 311 and URI Templates=
, right?

Stefan
--
Stefan Tilkov, http://www.innoq.com/blog/st/
